document.full_text: forces loyal to libyan leader muammar gaddafi mounted an intense artillery bombardment of rebel-held misrata on saturday and pro-gaddafi troops attacked shops and homes in the city center, residents said.
document.title: libya's misrata under intense bombardment: rebels
lines_and_colors: forces loyal to libyan leader muammar gaddafi mounted an intense artillery bombardment of rebel-held misrata on saturday and pro-gaddafi troops attacked shops and homes in the city center, residents said.
